reviews.review: I believe we deserve Half Life 2+EP.1+EP.2 Remastered. Please VALVE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Rise and shine Mr.Freeman. Rise and Shine.
Not to imply that you have been sleeping on the job. No one is more deserving of a rest. And all the effort in the world would have gone to waste until...well, let's just say your hour has come again. The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world. So, wake up, Mr. Freeman. Wake up and smell the ashes.
el juego se pasa rapido, los logros son otra cosa...

This is one of the best games, even if it is YEARS old. This is a must-have if you like sci-fi and other things like that.
One of the best game ever made
me lo e pasado 3 veces y todavia no me aburro y compralo muy bueno el juego

... I'm fucking old.. Back when it came out and I realized my computer actually can run the game with everything on low in 4:3 resolution, prolly 800x600... back when me and my friends had the only pirated copy that required you to re-engage the enemy AI from time to time as it would bug out. Back when Pure Pwnage was the most important thing in my life... Nostalgic "review", yes... more like recommendation than anything else. One of the few games that have absolutely unique soundtrack (Mirror's Edge is another game that comes to my mind).

This is true classic. <3
No wonder why this was the best game back then,sad that theres not gonna be another one
Classic game every gamer should play through at least once
like, yea definitely deserves the title of best game of all time

I played Half-Life 2 and both Episodes but I used a mod called "MMod" so the hours you see on Steam are inaccurate. I highly recommend that mod. It doesn't change the gameplay and its installation is a breeze; just follow what the readme.txt file says when you download it.

I loved all three games and the pace was excellent; I never felt tired or bored. I fought giant fights, I became overpowered destroying everyone and then the game threw completely new stuff at me in the Episodes. 

Having finished them I see now why people want Half-Life 3 so badly but... you know.
THIS GAME SUCKS I HATE IT, I POOPEDED MY PANTS -50000000000000/10!
skvela hra pro vsechny ktri maji radi sci-fi
